mapper.select: SELECT GAME_ROUND_ID AS roundId, GAMEROOM_GAME_ROOM_ID AS roomId, SUBJECT_SUBJECT_ID AS subjectId, ROUND_NUM AS roundNum, WIN_ROLE AS winRole, IMAGE AS imageUrl, STARTED_AT AS startedAt, FINISHED_AT AS finishedAt FROM ROUND WHERE GAME_ROUND_ID = #{roundId}

SELECT GAME_ROUND_ID AS id, GAMEROOM_GAME_ROOM_ID AS roomId, SUBJECT_SUBJECT_ID AS subjectId, ROUND_NUM AS roundNum, WIN_ROLE AS winRole, IMAGE AS imageUrl, STARTED_AT AS startedAt, FINISHED_AT AS finishedAt FROM ROUND
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROUND (GAMEROOM_GAME_ROOM_ID, SUBJECT_SUBJECT_ID, ROUND_NUM, WIN_ROLE, IMAGE, STARTED_AT, FINISHED_AT) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{subjectId}, #{roundNum}, #{winRole}, #{imageUrl}, #{startedAt}, #{finishedAt})
